welcomeFile.content:
Welcome to IlluminatOS!

Everything you see here is running in your browser.

Try exploring the file system using:
- Terminal (type "dir" and "cd")
- My Computer
- This desktop!

You can create, edit, and save files that persist across your session.

Have fun!

projectFiles.content:
# IlluminatOS!

A Windows 95-style operating system built with vanilla JavaScript.

## Features
- Virtual file system
- Multiple applications
- Desktop environment
- And more!
